items.title: Start Using The Mac OS X Terminal

visible_instructors.job_title: Software Engineer, Webpage Developer and Scrum Master
visible_instructors.name: Sean
visible_instructors.title: Sean McCammon

items.headline: Learn to use the Mac OS X Terminal like a Pro; create files and directories; search for files and edit code.
objectives_summary: You will be able to find and start the terminal
You will be able to navigate through the file system
You will be able to add and remove files and directories

items.title: Bash Shell Programming from the Ground Up
items.headline: Master the shell by thoroughly understanding its features - both on the command line (CLI) and through shell scripting.
objectives_summary: Thanks to a focus on detail you will acquire a solid grasp of the Bash shell - its behavior, its programming language as well as important Linux commands.

items.title: Windows Server 2016 with Powershell: Using WMI and CIM
items.headline: Learn about two technologies. WMI and CIM provide information from the operating system, computer hardware, software
objectives_summary: Connect to remote computers by using WMI or CIM
Describe the architecture of WMI and CIM
Explain the purpose of the repository

items.title: Mac: From Zero to Almost Hero
items.headline: Get to know your Mac and start using it effortlessly, so that you come closer to becoming a full Mac "Hero"
objectives_summary: Use a Mac proficiently and comfortably
Be productive and efficient at both professional work and leisure Mac usage
Set up a Mac from scratch and know where to look when solving a problem

items.title: Character Device Drivers in deep
items.headline: Linux Kernel Programming - Character Device Drivers
objectives_summary: Write character device driver from scratch
Understand the various file operations provided by character driver

items.title: Essentials of Developing Windows Store Apps Using C#

visible_instructors.title: Compaq learning
visible_instructors.job_title: One stop to learn and succeed
visible_instructors.name: Compaq

items.headline: A complete guide to develop Windows Store Apps using C#
objectives_summary: Design and develop the Windows Store apps
Discuss the new Windows development API called WinRT
Describe how to add advanced features to an app, such as tasks, tiles, and notifications

items.title: Linux Fundamentals For Beginners: Updated for 2021
items.headline: This course cover the Fundamentals of Linux and we are using RHEL
objectives_summary: Able to install multiple Linux Flavours
Hands-On Experience using Linux
Able to perform Basic Management Tasks

items.title: Embedded Linux using Yocto Part 4
items.headline: Learn Yocto Project in Deep - SState-Cache, Kernel Recipes, Package Groups
objectives_summary: Internals of shared state cache
bitbake-dumpsig, bitbake-diffsigs

items.title: Linux Socket Programming Hands On - Zero to Hero
items.headline: Topics covered :Local Sockets, Socket System calls,TCP Echo Server & Concurrent Server, UDP server, I/O Multiplexing etc
objectives_summary: Understanding of  Sockets and End point of Communication
Different Types of Sockets in Linux: Local and Remote/Internet Sockets
Socket System calls in Details

items.title: Data Recovery, Hard Drives, USB Drives, etc.
items.headline: Course to recover deleted, deleted, formatted files from: hard drives, USB drives, SD, computers, laptop
objectives_summary: Low Level Format
Quick format
Recover Deleted or Deleted Files

items.title: How to repair your computer in 10 Easy Steps
items.headline: This class will show you simple ways to keep your computer running fast and trouble free.
objectives_summary: Perform  basic repairs to their computers
Backup you data and pictures
Create a system restore disk

items.title: Linux : Linux Administration Advanced Disk Systems Practical
items.headline: Learn Red Hat Linux & CentOS: Use the in-demand skills to start a career as a Linux Server Admin or Linux Administrator!
objectives_summary: Study to pass the RHCE-the benchmark certification for Red Hat Enterprise Linux-and master disk systems and system backup techniques for Linux

items.title: Windows 10 for Beginners
items.headline: Learn everything you need to know for your daily Work in Windows 10
objectives_summary: Students will know how to handle the most important tasks in Windows 10
Students will feel familiar with the new Operating System

items.title: Learn Camtasia Studio Full Course
items.headline: In this Course you will learn about  centered around the advanced features and techniques that Camtasia Studio 8 offers.
objectives_summary: Create Camtasia Studio Library Media
Project Collaboration
Create Engaging Screencasts

items.title: Microsoft Windows Server 2016 Certification: Exam 70-740
items.headline: Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate (MCSA), Windows Server 2016, Interview Preparation, MCQ with Explanations
objectives_summary: This course will not only help anyone who is looking to pass the Microsoft certification exam 70-740, it will also help anyone who wants to learn the real ins and outs of Windows Server 2016 operating system.
